#summary Eclipse setup

PINF is developed using [http://www.eclipse.org/ eclipse] as the IDE. PINF is also aimed for use in Virtualized environments, specifically [http://aws.amazon.com/ Amazon Web Services].

= Typical Eclipse Setup =

  # Download *Eclipse PDT All-in-one* from: http://www.zend.com/en/community/pdt
  # Install Plugins (Menu: _Help_ -> _Install New Software..._, _Work with:_ -> _Add_):
    # *Web Tools Platform (WTP)*: http://download.eclipse.org/webtools/updates/
    # *AWS Toolkit for Eclipse*: http://aws.amazon.com/eclipse
